p: Momordica charantia ( Figure 4B) is commonly used in the traditional medicine of different developing countries for its multiple properties, especially as antidiabetic [ 69]. In our study, this plant was mainly used by local people to lower blood pressure. Such effect, also reported in African folk medicine, was tested on normal and diabetic rats showing that an aqueous extract possesses hypoglycaemic and hypotensive properties [ 70].
